column4: I need help with lost sound in Flash under FF 3.5.6 on Kubuntu 9.10.  I tried following this: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=255422 I made the installation, but can't find firefoxrc.  in /etc I have firefox-3.0 and firefox-3.5.  firefoxrc is in neither.
- I uninstalled and reinstalled flashplugin-installer but still no flashrc file or folder in firefox directory and no sound in FF.
als no sound entrance in soundproperties ?
